docs: Creates a new Donation NFT contract
constructors.label: new

docs: Donation Receipt NFT Contract
This contract implements PSP34 (Polkadot NFT standard) to mint unique
NFTs as receipts for donations made on the DotNation platform.
Event emitted when a donation NFT is minted
events.label: DonationNftMinted

docs: Event emitted when a token is transferred
events.label: Transfer

docs: Mints a new donation receipt NFT
Can only be called by the authorized platform contract
messages.label: mint_donation_receipt

docs: Gets the owner of a token
messages.label: owner_of

docs: Gets the metadata of a donation NFT
messages.label: get_token_metadata

docs: Gets all tokens owned by an account
messages.label: tokens_of_owner

docs: Gets all tokens with metadata owned by an account
messages.label: tokens_of_owner_with_metadata

docs: Gets the total supply of NFTs
messages.label: total_supply

docs: Gets the collection name
messages.label: collection_name

docs: Gets the collection symbol
messages.label: collection_symbol

docs: Updates the platform contract address (admin only)
messages.label: set_platform_contract

docs: Gets the platform contract address
messages.label: get_platform_contract

docs: Gets donation statistics for an account
messages.label: get_donation_stats

docs: Gets all donations made to a specific campaign
messages.label: get_campaign_donations

docs: Transfer an NFT to another address
messages.label: transfer

docs: Enable or disable NFT transfers (admin only)
messages.label: set_transfers_enabled

docs: Check if transfers are enabled
messages.label: are_transfers_enabled

docs: Get leaderboard of top donors by total amount donated
messages.label: get_leaderboard

docs: Get NFTs by rarity tier
messages.label: get_nfts_by_rarity

docs: Get rarity distribution for an owner
messages.label: get_rarity_distribution

docs: Get total amount donated by an address (original donations only)
messages.label: get_total_donated

docs: Get achievement status for a donor
messages.label: get_achievements
